name: RPSChess
description:
• A combination of Rock-Paper-Scissors and Chess.
  • 2-Player game. Also has an AI mode for singleplayer gameplay.
  • Players control 3 pieces that move like the King in Chess.
  • To win you must either:
    1. Capture your opponent's pieces, or
    2. Reach their corner with one of yours.
  • Features local and online multiplayer (requires port forwarding).
